command.program:
check_samplesheet.py \
        samplesheet_test_amplicon_illumina.csv \
        samplesheet.valid.csv \
        --platform illumina

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:INPUT_CHECK:SAMPLESHEET_CHECK":
        python: $(python --version | sed 's/Python //g')
    END_VERSIONS

collapse_primer_bed.py \
        --left_primer_suffix _LEFT \
        --right_primer_suffix _RIGHT \
        nCoV-2019.primer.bed \
        nCoV-2019.primer.collapsed.bed

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:COLLAPSE_PRIMERS":
        python: $(python --version | sed 's/Python //g')
    END_VERSIONS

makeblastdb \
        -in nCoV-2019.reference.fasta \
        -parse_seqids -dbtype nucl
    mkdir blast_db
    mv nCoV-2019.reference.fasta* blast_db
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:BLAST_MAKEBLASTDB":
        blast: $(blastn -version 2>&1 | sed 's/^.*blastn: //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir bowtie2
    bowtie2-build --seed 1 --threads 1 nCoV-2019.reference.fasta bowtie2/nCoV-2019.reference
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:BOWTIE2_BUILD":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

samtools faidx nCoV-2019.reference.fasta
    cut -f 1,2 nCoV-2019.reference.fasta.fai > nCoV-2019.reference.fasta.sizes

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:CUSTOM_GETCHROMSIZES":
        getchromsizes: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

gunzip \
        -f \
         \
        GCA_009858895.3_ASM985889v3_genomic.200409.gff.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:GUNZIP_GFF":
        gunzip: $(echo $(gunzip --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*(gzip) //; s/ Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

bedtools \
        getfasta \
        -s -nameOnly \
        -fi nCoV-2019.reference.fasta \
        -bed nCoV-2019.primer.bed \
        -fo nCoV-2019.primer.fa

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:BEDTOOLS_GETFASTA":
        bedtools: $(bedtools --version | sed -e "s/bedtools v//g")
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir nextclade_sars-cov-2_MN908947_2022-06-14T12_00_00Z

    ## Ensures --strip-components only applied when top level of tar contents is a directory
    ## If just files or multiple directories, place all in prefix
    if [[ $(tar -taf nextclade_sars-cov-2_MN908947_2022-06-14T12_00_00Z.tar.gz | grep -o -P "^.*?\/" | uniq | wc -l) -eq 1 ]]; then
        tar \
            -C nextclade_sars-cov-2_MN908947_2022-06-14T12_00_00Z --strip-components 1 \
            -xavf \
             \
            nextclade_sars-cov-2_MN908947_2022-06-14T12_00_00Z.tar.gz \
            --no-same-owner
    else
        tar \
            -C nextclade_sars-cov-2_MN908947_2022-06-14T12_00_00Z \
            -xavf \
             \
            nextclade_sars-cov-2_MN908947_2022-06-14T12_00_00Z.tar.gz \
            --no-same-owner
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:UNTAR_NEXTCLADE_DB":
        untar: $(echo $(tar --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*(GNU tar) //; s/ Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir kraken2_hs22

    ## Ensures --strip-components only applied when top level of tar contents is a directory
    ## If just files or multiple directories, place all in prefix
    if [[ $(tar -taf kraken2_hs22.tar.gz | grep -o -P "^.*?\/" | uniq | wc -l) -eq 1 ]]; then
        tar \
            -C kraken2_hs22 --strip-components 1 \
            -xavf \
             \
            kraken2_hs22.tar.gz \
            --no-same-owner
    else
        tar \
            -C kraken2_hs22 \
            -xavf \
             \
            kraken2_hs22.tar.gz \
            --no-same-owner
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:UNTAR_KRAKEN2_DB":
        untar: $(echo $(tar --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*(GNU tar) //; s/ Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  SAMPLE2_PE_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -sf sample2_R1.fastq.gz SAMPLE2_PE_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  SAMPLE2_PE_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -sf sample2_R2.fastq.gz SAMPLE2_PE_2.fastq.gz
        fastp \
            --in1 SAMPLE2_PE_1.fastq.gz \
            --in2 SAMPLE2_PE_2.fastq.gz \
            --out1 SAMPLE2_PE_1.fastp.fastq.gz \
            --out2 SAMPLE2_PE_2.fastp.fastq.gz \
            --json SAMPLE2_PE.fastp.json \
            --html SAMPLE2_PE.fastp.html \
             \
             \
             \
            --thread 1 \
            --detect_adapter_for_pe \
            --cut_front --cut_tail --trim_poly_x --cut_mean_quality 30 --qualified_quality_phred 30 --unqualified_percent_limit 10 --length_required 50 \
            2> SAMPLE2_PE.fastp.log

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTP":
            fastp: $(fastp --version 2>&1 | sed -e "s/fastp //g")
        END_VERSIONS

printf "%s %s\n" sample2_R1.fastq.gz SAMPLE2_PE_1.gz sample2_R2.fastq.gz SAMPLE2_PE_2.gz | while read old_name new_name; do
        [ -f "${new_name}" ] || ln -s $old_name $new_name
    done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 SAMPLE2_PE_1.gz SAMPLE2_PE_2.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTQC_RAW":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

cat input1/sample1_R1.fastq.gz input2/sample2_R1.fastq.gz > SAMPLE3_SE.merged.fastq.gz

            cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
            "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:CAT_FASTQ":
                cat: $(echo $(cat --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*coreutils) //; s/ .*$//')
            END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  SAMPLE1_PE_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -sf sample1_R1.fastq.gz SAMPLE1_PE_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  SAMPLE1_PE_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -sf sample1_R2.fastq.gz SAMPLE1_PE_2.fastq.gz
        fastp \
            --in1 SAMPLE1_PE_1.fastq.gz \
            --in2 SAMPLE1_PE_2.fastq.gz \
            --out1 SAMPLE1_PE_1.fastp.fastq.gz \
            --out2 SAMPLE1_PE_2.fastp.fastq.gz \
            --json SAMPLE1_PE.fastp.json \
            --html SAMPLE1_PE.fastp.html \
             \
             \
             \
            --thread 1 \
            --detect_adapter_for_pe \
            --cut_front --cut_tail --trim_poly_x --cut_mean_quality 30 --qualified_quality_phred 30 --unqualified_percent_limit 10 --length_required 50 \
            2> SAMPLE1_PE.fastp.log

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTP":
            fastp: $(fastp --version 2>&1 | sed -e "s/fastp //g")
        END_VERSIONS

printf "%s %s\n" sample1_R1.fastq.gz SAMPLE1_PE_1.gz sample1_R2.fastq.gz SAMPLE1_PE_2.gz | while read old_name new_name; do
        [ -f "${new_name}" ] || ln -s $old_name $new_name
    done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 SAMPLE1_PE_1.gz SAMPLE1_PE_2.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTQC_RAW":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir -p snpeff_db/genomes/
    cd snpeff_db/genomes/
    ln -s ../../nCoV-2019.reference.fasta nCoV-2019.reference.fa

    cd ../../
    mkdir -p snpeff_db/nCoV-2019.reference/
    cd snpeff_db/nCoV-2019.reference/
    ln -s ../../GCA_009858895.3_ASM985889v3_genomic.200409.gff genes.gff

    cd ../../
    echo "nCoV-2019.reference.genome : nCoV-2019.reference" > snpeff.config

    snpEff \
        -Xmx6g \
        build \
        -config snpeff.config \
        -dataDir ./snpeff_db \
        -gff3 \
        -v \
        nCoV-2019.reference

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:PREPARE_GENOME:SNPEFF_BUILD":
        snpeff: $(echo $(snpEff -version 2>&1) | cut -f 2 -d ' ')
    END_VERSIONS

printf "%s %s\n" SAMPLE2_PE_1.fastp.fastq.gz SAMPLE2_PE_1.gz SAMPLE2_PE_2.fastp.fastq.gz SAMPLE2_PE_2.gz | while read old_name new_name; do
        [ -f "${new_name}" ] || ln -s $old_name $new_name
    done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 SAMPLE2_PE_1.gz SAMPLE2_PE_2.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTQC_TRIM":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

kraken2 \
        --db kraken2_hs22 \
        --threads 1 \
        --report SAMPLE2_PE.kraken2.report.txt \
        --gzip-compressed \
        --unclassified-out SAMPLE2_PE.unclassified#.fastq \
        --classified-out SAMPLE2_PE.classified#.fastq \
        --output SAMPLE2_PE.kraken2.classifiedreads.txt \
        --paired \
        --report-zero-counts \
        SAMPLE2_PE_1.fastp.fastq.gz SAMPLE2_PE_2.fastp.fastq.gz

    pigz -p 1 *.fastq

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:KRAKEN2_KRAKEN2":
        kraken2: $(echo $(kraken2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Kraken version //; s/ .*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2l" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2l$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && echo "Bowtie2 index files not found" 1>&2 && exit 1

    bowtie2 \
        -x $INDEX \
        -1 SAMPLE2_PE_1.fastp.fastq.gz -2 SAMPLE2_PE_2.fastp.fastq.gz \
        --threads 1 \
         \
        --local --very-sensitive-local --seed 1 \
        2> SAMPLE2_PE.bowtie2.log \
        | samtools view -F4 -bhS --threads 1 -o SAMPLE2_PE.bam -

    if [ -f SAMPLE2_PE.unmapped.fastq.1.gz ]; then
        mv SAMPLE2_PE.unmapped.fastq.1.gz SAMPLE2_PE.unmapped_1.fastq.gz
    fi

    if [ -f SAMPLE2_PE.unmapped.fastq.2.gz ]; then
        mv SAMPLE2_PE.unmapped.fastq.2.gz SAMPLE2_PE.unmapped_2.fastq.gz
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_ALIGN_BOWTIE2:BOWTIE2_ALIGN":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

printf "%s %s\n" SAMPLE3_SE.merged.fastq.gz SAMPLE3_SE.gz | while read old_name new_name; do
        [ -f "${new_name}" ] || ln -s $old_name $new_name
    done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 SAMPLE3_SE.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTQC_RAW":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  SAMPLE3_SE.fastq.gz ] && ln -sf SAMPLE3_SE.merged.fastq.gz SAMPLE3_SE.fastq.gz

        fastp \
            --in1 SAMPLE3_SE.fastq.gz \
            --out1  SAMPLE3_SE.fastp.fastq.gz \
            --thread 1 \
            --json SAMPLE3_SE.fastp.json \
            --html SAMPLE3_SE.fastp.html \
             \
             \
            --cut_front --cut_tail --trim_poly_x --cut_mean_quality 30 --qualified_quality_phred 30 --unqualified_percent_limit 10 --length_required 50 \
            2> SAMPLE3_SE.fastp.log

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTP":
            fastp: $(fastp --version 2>&1 | sed -e "s/fastp //g")
        END_VERSIONS

printf "%s %s\n" SAMPLE1_PE_1.fastp.fastq.gz SAMPLE1_PE_1.gz SAMPLE1_PE_2.fastp.fastq.gz SAMPLE1_PE_2.gz | while read old_name new_name; do
        [ -f "${new_name}" ] || ln -s $old_name $new_name
    done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 SAMPLE1_PE_1.gz SAMPLE1_PE_2.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTQC_TRIM":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2l" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2l$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && echo "Bowtie2 index files not found" 1>&2 && exit 1

    bowtie2 \
        -x $INDEX \
        -1 SAMPLE1_PE_1.fastp.fastq.gz -2 SAMPLE1_PE_2.fastp.fastq.gz \
        --threads 1 \
         \
        --local --very-sensitive-local --seed 1 \
        2> SAMPLE1_PE.bowtie2.log \
        | samtools view -F4 -bhS --threads 1 -o SAMPLE1_PE.bam -

    if [ -f SAMPLE1_PE.unmapped.fastq.1.gz ]; then
        mv SAMPLE1_PE.unmapped.fastq.1.gz SAMPLE1_PE.unmapped_1.fastq.gz
    fi

    if [ -f SAMPLE1_PE.unmapped.fastq.2.gz ]; then
        mv SAMPLE1_PE.unmapped.fastq.2.gz SAMPLE1_PE.unmapped_2.fastq.gz
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_ALIGN_BOWTIE2:BOWTIE2_ALIGN":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

kraken2 \
        --db kraken2_hs22 \
        --threads 1 \
        --report SAMPLE1_PE.kraken2.report.txt \
        --gzip-compressed \
        --unclassified-out SAMPLE1_PE.unclassified#.fastq \
        --classified-out SAMPLE1_PE.classified#.fastq \
        --output SAMPLE1_PE.kraken2.classifiedreads.txt \
        --paired \
        --report-zero-counts \
        SAMPLE1_PE_1.fastp.fastq.gz SAMPLE1_PE_2.fastp.fastq.gz

    pigz -p 1 *.fastq

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:KRAKEN2_KRAKEN2":
        kraken2: $(echo $(kraken2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Kraken version //; s/ .*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

sed -r '/^[ACTGactg]+$/ s/$/X/g' nCoV-2019.primer.fa > adapters.sub.fa

    cutadapt \
        --cores 1 \
        --overlap 5 --minimum-length 30 --error-rate 0.1 \
        -a file:adapters.sub.fa -A file:adapters.sub.fa \
        -o SAMPLE2_PE.primer_trim_1.fastq.gz -p SAMPLE2_PE.primer_trim_2.fastq.gz \
        SAMPLE2_PE.unclassified_1.fastq.gz SAMPLE2_PE.unclassified_2.fastq.gz \
        > SAMPLE2_PE.primer_trim.cutadapt.log

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:CUTADAPT":
        cutadapt: $(cutadapt --version)
    END_VERSIONS

samtools sort  -@ 1 -o SAMPLE2_PE.sorted.bam -T SAMPLE2_PE.sorted SAMPLE2_PE.bam
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_ALIGN_BOWTIE2:BAM_SORT_STATS_SAMTOOLS:SAMTOOLS_SORT":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

printf "%s %s\n" SAMPLE3_SE.fastp.fastq.gz SAMPLE3_SE.gz | while read old_name new_name; do
        [ -f "${new_name}" ] || ln -s $old_name $new_name
    done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 SAMPLE3_SE.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_TRIM_FASTP_FASTQC:FASTQC_TRIM":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

kraken2 \
        --db kraken2_hs22 \
        --threads 1 \
        --report SAMPLE3_SE.kraken2.report.txt \
        --gzip-compressed \
        --unclassified-out SAMPLE3_SE.unclassified.fastq \
        --classified-out SAMPLE3_SE.classified.fastq \
        --output SAMPLE3_SE.kraken2.classifiedreads.txt \
         \
        --report-zero-counts \
        SAMPLE3_SE.fastp.fastq.gz

    pigz -p 1 *.fastq

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:KRAKEN2_KRAKEN2":
        kraken2: $(echo $(kraken2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Kraken version //; s/ .*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2l" | sed "s/\.rev.1.bt2l$//"`
    [ -z "$INDEX" ] && echo "Bowtie2 index files not found" 1>&2 && exit 1

    bowtie2 \
        -x $INDEX \
        -U SAMPLE3_SE.fastp.fastq.gz \
        --threads 1 \
         \
        --local --very-sensitive-local --seed 1 \
        2> SAMPLE3_SE.bowtie2.log \
        | samtools view -F4 -bhS --threads 1 -o SAMPLE3_SE.bam -

    if [ -f SAMPLE3_SE.unmapped.fastq.1.gz ]; then
        mv SAMPLE3_SE.unmapped.fastq.1.gz SAMPLE3_SE.unmapped_1.fastq.gz
    fi

    if [ -f SAMPLE3_SE.unmapped.fastq.2.gz ]; then
        mv SAMPLE3_SE.unmapped.fastq.2.gz SAMPLE3_SE.unmapped_2.fastq.gz
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_ALIGN_BOWTIE2:BOWTIE2_ALIGN":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

samtools sort  -@ 1 -o SAMPLE1_PE.sorted.bam -T SAMPLE1_PE.sorted SAMPLE1_PE.bam
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:FASTQ_ALIGN_BOWTIE2:BAM_SORT_STATS_SAMTOOLS:SAMTOOLS_SORT":
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

sed -r '/^[ACTGactg]+$/ s/$/X/g' nCoV-2019.primer.fa > adapters.sub.fa

    cutadapt \
        --cores 1 \
        --overlap 5 --minimum-length 30 --error-rate 0.1 \
        -a file:adapters.sub.fa -A file:adapters.sub.fa \
        -o SAMPLE1_PE.primer_trim_1.fastq.gz -p SAMPLE1_PE.primer_trim_2.fastq.gz \
        SAMPLE1_PE.unclassified_1.fastq.gz SAMPLE1_PE.unclassified_2.fastq.gz \
        > SAMPLE1_PE.primer_trim.cutadapt.log

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:CUTADAPT":
        cutadapt: $(cutadapt --version)
    END_VERSIONS

unicycler \
        --threads 1 \
         \
        -1 SAMPLE2_PE.primer_trim_1.fastq.gz -2 SAMPLE2_PE.primer_trim_2.fastq.gz \
         \
        --out ./

    mv assembly.fasta SAMPLE2_PE.scaffolds.fa
    gzip -n SAMPLE2_PE.scaffolds.fa
    mv assembly.gfa SAMPLE2_PE.assembly.gfa
    gzip -n SAMPLE2_PE.assembly.gfa
    mv unicycler.log SAMPLE2_PE.unicycler.log

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:ASSEMBLY_UNICYCLER:UNICYCLER":
        unicycler: $(echo $(unicycler --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Unicycler v//; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

spades.py \
        --rnaviral \
        --threads 1 \
        --memory 6 \
         \
        -1 SAMPLE2_PE.primer_trim_1.fastq.gz -2 SAMPLE2_PE.primer_trim_2.fastq.gz   \
        -o ./
    mv spades.log SAMPLE2_PE.spades.log

    if [ -f scaffolds.fasta ]; then
        mv scaffolds.fasta SAMPLE2_PE.scaffolds.fa
        gzip -n SAMPLE2_PE.scaffolds.fa
    fi
    if [ -f contigs.fasta ]; then
        mv contigs.fasta SAMPLE2_PE.contigs.fa
        gzip -n SAMPLE2_PE.contigs.fa
    fi
    if [ -f transcripts.fasta ]; then
        mv transcripts.fasta SAMPLE2_PE.transcripts.fa
        gzip -n SAMPLE2_PE.transcripts.fa
    fi
    if [ -f assembly_graph_with_scaffolds.gfa ]; then
        mv assembly_graph_with_scaffolds.gfa SAMPLE2_PE.assembly.gfa
        gzip -n SAMPLE2_PE.assembly.gfa
    fi

def args = task.ext.args ?: ''
template 'dumpsoftwareversions.py'

## Run MultiQC once to parse tool logs
    multiqc -f -k yaml  .

    ## Parse YAML files dumped by MultiQC to obtain metrics
    multiqc_to_custom_csv.py --platform illumina

    ## Manually remove files that we don't want in the report
    if grep -q ">skip_assembly<" workflow_summary_mqc.yaml; then
        rm -f *assembly_metrics_mqc.csv
    fi

    if grep -q ">skip_variants<" workflow_summary_mqc.yaml; then
        rm -f *variants_metrics_mqc.csv
    fi

    rm -f variants/report.tsv

    ## Run MultiQC a second time
    multiqc -f -k yaml -e general_stats --ignore nextclade_clade_mqc.tsv  .

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_VIRALRECON:ILLUMINA:MULTIQC":
        multiqc: $( multiqc --version | sed -e "s/multiqc, version //g" )
    END_VERSIONS
